text: [Chapter 06] [Outer Static, Territory of Static]

speaker: left
text: It's getting dark, we'll stop by at nearby town soon.
[Outer Town, Territory of Static]
(The streets are full of people, shouting and moving chaotically)

speaker: left
text: I did not expect the town to be so busy this late at night...
???: Hey, you just get here?

speaker: left
text: Yes, we have just arrived.
???: Then you probably haven't heard the news yet, have you?

speaker: left
text: News?
???: The Holy Itucher has been discovered at the Nation of Altar.

speaker: left
text: The Holy Itucher!?

speaker: left
text: You mean to tell me that an artifact was discovered while I was away on this mission!?
???: You all know the legends, right?
???: 'bout how the "worthy one to wield the Holy Itucher will be granted the power of the Dimensionals"?

speaker: left
text: Of course I do, I'm the Head of Artifact Research in the Territory of Static!
???: As you can tell, everyone in town is rushing to head to the Nation of Altar.

speaker: left
text: What about you?
???: I'm on my way to the Nation of Altar myself.
???: My cousin works there at the temple, so I'll know the way there better than the others.
???: I can help you guys get there if you have the gold, you know?

speaker: left
text: You'll do that and miss out on getting it for yourself?
???: Me? The chosen one? Don't make me laugh.
???: If I'm not getting the power I might as well get some money.

speaker: right
text: Hiring him or not, we should head there immediately. Who knows what could happen if the Itucher got into the wrong hands.
[Recruit ????] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit
???: You've made the right choice. My name's Bladen, by the way.
[Bladen has joined your party]

speaker: left
text: Even though it's nightime, will need to head to Altar immediately.

speaker: left
text: The world will be in danger if the Holy Itucher is used for evil.
